name: UTG (Olaowo)
description:
UTG, Unititled Game, couldn't come up with a name for the game. It was initially made for a game jam, but couldn't finish in time. Anyway, I kept working on it.

UTH is a simple platformer with enemies to shoot down.

Swap between green and blue ammo, (blue heals) while traversing the small lands

Controls (Keyboard)

  • Movement:  W/A/S/D
  • Jump: Space
  • Shoot: Left Mouse Click
  • Aim: Mouse
  • Special: Right Mouse Click
  • Dash: F
  • Swap: Q
  • Pause: Escape

Controls (GamePad) xbox controller

  • Movement:  Left Analog stick
  • Jump: A
  • Shoot: RT
  • Aim: Right Analog stick
  • Special: RB
  • Dash: B
  • Swap: Y
  • Pause: Menu Button

For the game to register gamepad, have a gamepad connected and press any of the buttons first, especially on WebGL.
